oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gospel Sing Featuring the Happy Goodman Family at Waycross Memorial Stadium (18865)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gospel music; Happy Goodman Family (Musical group); Blackwood Brothers Quartet.; Jerry & the Goffs; Hemphills (Musical group); Wynn, Willie; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half-sheet (red and black on green) announcing the World's Largest Annual Sun-Down to Sun-Up Gospel Sing featuring the Happy Goodman Family, the Blackwood Brothers, the Hemphills, Sonny Simmons and the Action Singers, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans at Waycross Memorial Stadium on August 27. Poster features metal photoplates of the Happy Goodman Family, the Blackwood Brothers, Jerry and the Singing Goffs, and Willie Wynn and the Tennesseans. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/47631/
